ing: 1 cup sliced fresh peaches, or as desired
n: Frosty Peach, Watermelon, and Strawberry Smoothie
des: "A simple smoothie with a smooth texture and great taste. If too thick, add more juice. If too thin, add more frozen peaches."
ins: Blend milk, peaches, ice cream, juice, and confectioners' sugar together in a blender until smooth.
